description: This skill focuses on helping students interpret lines of best fit: word problems
basic_questions_example: The scatter plot shows the relationship between hours of exercise per week and resting heart rate. The line of best fit is $y = -2x + 75$. Interpret the meaning of the slope and y-intercept in this context. What heart rate would you predict for someone who exercises 6 hours per week?
A company uses a line of best fit to predict sales based on advertising spending. Given the equation and a budget, calculate predicted sales.
Analyze a real-world scenario with a scatter plot and line of best fit, answering questions about the relationship and making informed predictions.
